name: KlimCoin — Click, Мine, Make Money!
description:
Play and mine virtual currency KlimCoin in two languages!

KlimCoin — is the mining software application for the virtual currency KlimCoin that enables you to mine and top up your wallet while playing mini games with your friends!  

Click — buy, click — buy more, click and buy more and more untill you make the richest miner in the history! 

Tired of clicking? 

Increase auto mining speed and enjoy automatic mode of making coins!

Well, if you want to entertain yourself you can play plenty of mini games embedded in the app. 

User friendly interface, a variety of games and much more you will find in the unique game KlimCoin. 

Download KlimCoin before your friends to develop faster than they do.
